node.name: Safe-Drive
node.description: Driver Drowsiness, Aggressiveness, Distracted-ness detection Software

node.name: competitive-analysis-paper-experiment
node.description: This repo contains the experimental setup, results and EDA plots for the "Competitive Analysis of the top Gradient Boosting Machine Learning Algorithms" conference paper

node.name: Automated-Human-Tracking-AI
node.description: This repo has the final year project "God's Eye" which is a prototype for a Fully automated human tracking software which is based on a modular AI approach

node.name: Smart-Traffic-Violation-Recognition-Automation
node.description: This software was developed in order to automatically recognize license plate numbers and detect if the odd even rule is followed and inform the defaulters automatically with a system generated email so that manual intervention is virtually eliminated

node.name: Stock-Predicition-LSTM
node.description: This project gives an LSTM based implementation of a stock prediction model where the closing price of stocks are read from a csv file and are trained with suitable hyper-parameters
